syntax.uno: private static voidraise(Fuse.UserEvent n, object[] args) {}

comment.brief: Raises a UserEvent with an optional set of arguments.

parameters.name: args
parameters.description:
_(optional)_ A plain JavaScript objectrepresenting name-value pairs of arguments to be passed with the
event. When using a JavaScript function to handle the event
(via @Fuse.Triggers.OnUserEvent.Handler), this object will be
passed as the first argument to the handler function.
